Class WinCheck

java.lang.Object
GameMachin
WinCheck
Direct Known Subclasses:
AiLogic
public class WinCheck
extends GameMachin
This class contains tools for using a check who wins the tictactoe game.
Author:
Joonatan De Pascale

  • Method Details

    • printWin

      public boolean printWin​(java.lang.String[][] gb, boolean turn)
      Prints the winner and returns a boolean value of true if the winner is found otherwise false. Takes a parameter 2d-array and a turn. Checks the number of consecutive characters with the win() method. If the win is a player will be printed: "CONGRATULATION YOU WIN!!". If the win is a computr will be printed: "Ai palyer WIN, Try again!. If the win is a draw will be printed: "It is draw!".
      Parameters:
      gb - String 2d-aaray.
      turn - Boolean value true or false.
      Returns:
      Retrun boolean value.

    • win

      public boolean win​(java.lang.String[][] array, java.lang.String playerChar, int countWin)
      Return true if character is as much as needed to win. The method requests that the chips be check from each direction. If there are enough consecutive similar chips to win, the return is true otherwise false.
      Parameters:
      array - String 2d-array.
      playerChar - String which is the player's character.
      countWin - the integer number of consecutive tokens required to win.
      Returns:
      Retrun boolean value.

    • widthheightWin

      public int widthheightWin​(java.lang.String[][] array, int line, java.lang.String playerChar)
      This checks the position of the playerChar horizontally and vertically. If on the line is playerChar then the counter is plus one and if next one is same playerChar then the counter is plus one. Otherwise counter reset back to zero. If somewhere is playerChar enough to win, return the counter number. Otherwise retrun higher couner number.
      Parameters:
      array - String 2d-taulukko.
      line - Integer value.
      playerChar - String which is a player chip on game board.
      Returns:
      Integer value.

    • backslashWin

      public int backslashWin​(java.lang.String[][] array, int line, java.lang.String playerChar)
      This checks the position of the playerChar on the from top right to down left. If on the line is playerChar then the counter is plus one and if next one is same playerChar then the counter is plus one. Otherwise counter reset back to zero. If somewhere is playerChar enough to win, return the counter number. Otherwise retrun higher couner number.
      Parameters:
      array - String 2d-taulukko.
      line - Integer value.
      playerChar - String which is a player chip on game board.
      Returns:
      Integer value.

    • slashWin

      public int slashWin​(java.lang.String[][] array, int line, java.lang.String playerChar)
      This checks the position of the playerChar on the from top left to down right. If on the line is playerChar then the counter is plus one and if next one is same playerChar then the counter is plus one. Otherwise counter reset back to zero. If somewhere is playerChar enough to win, return the counter number. Otherwise retrun higher couner number.
      Parameters:
      array - String 2d-taulukko.
      line - Integer value.
      playerChar - String which is a player chip on game board.
      Returns:
      Integer value.

    • draw

      public boolean draw​(java.lang.String[][] array)
      Returns true if the game is a draw otherwise false. Cheks that in 2d-array doon't have empty places. If in 2d-array is empty place return false and if the 2d-aray is full return true. If the 2d-array is full it is meen that game is draw.
      Parameters:
      array - String 2d-array
      Returns:
      retutn boolean value true or false
